original_title: Online application process for passports from June 15
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Immigration and Emigration said online applications to have passports delivered to the residence can be submitted from June (15).
The Controller General of Immigration and Emigration Harsha Ilukpitiya said the passport can be delivered to the applicant's home within three days.
The Controller General of Immigration and Emigration said the payment for the passport can also be made online.

Sri Lanka thrashes Afghanistan by nine wickets for 2-1 ODI series win
